nodes.bodyText: personally I think this is a lot simpler if empty coerces to null. A lot less to explain, no chance of accidental mutable empty types, easier tests.. do you see what I mean @anuraaga ?

nodes.bodyText: normal baggage S will be string, so this has to be nullable, lack of annotation before was a mistake!

When the value is {@code null} and the input only includes the given field, either {@code + * null} or an appropriate empty sentinel value should be returned. + * + *

When {@code null} is returned, the next non-null update results in a call to {@link + * #newState}.
